plays.text: Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Jaroslav Hlinka and Kurt Sauer
Goal scored by Brett Clark assisted by Milan Hejduk and Paul Stastny
Penalty to Tyler Arnason 2 minutes for Holding Robert Nilsson
Penalty to Kyle Brodziak 2 minutes for Tripping John-Michael Liles
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Holding Andrew Brunette
Goal scored by Joe Sakic (Power Play) assisted by Paul Stastny and Milan Hejduk
Penalty to Robert Nilsson 2 minutes for Hooking Ryan Smyth
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Roughing Ryan Smyth
Penalty to Ryan Smyth 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Staios
Goal scored by Wojtek Wolski assisted by Joe Sakic and Kyle Cumiskey
Penalty to Wojtek Wolski 2 minutes for High-sticking Andrew Cogliano
Penalty to Joni Pitkanen 2 minutes for Holding Ben Guite
Penalty to Kyle Cumiskey 2 minutes for Tripping Zack Stortini
Goal scored by Raffi Torres assisted by Jarret Stoll and Zack Stortini
Penalty to Andrew Brunette 2 minutes for High-sticking Steve Staios
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Hooking Ryan Smyth
Goal scored by Shawn Horcoff assisted by Denis Grebeshkov and Sam Gagner
